info.title: Document Generation Service API
info.description: Document Generation and Distribution System using JasperReports

tags.name: Async Monitoring
tags.description: Async document generation monitoring and metrics

get.description: Retrieve user details by ID (Admin or own profile access)

put.description: Update user profile information (Admin or own profile access)

delete.description: Delete user account (Admin role required, cannot delete own account)

put.description: Update user role assignments (Admin role required, cannot remove own admin role)

400.description: Invalid request or cannot remove own admin role

put.description: Change password for a specific user (Admin or own password change)

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile of the currently authenticated user
Change the password of the currently authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of users with optional search (Admin role required)

post.description: Create a new user account (Admin role required)
Generate document in specified format with native JSON type support, parameter validation, and optional JSON data source

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format (pdf, xlsx, docx, rtf, html)

post.description: Upload new document template (ZIP format, manager role required)

400.description: Invalid request or file validation failed

post.description: Generate a new JWT access token and refresh token using a valid refresh token. The refresh token must be provided in the Authorization header with Bearer prefix. Returns new access and refresh tokens if the provided refresh token is valid.

400.description: Bad request - JWT authentication is disabled

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or expired refresh token

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Manually initiates cleanup of old audit logs based on retention policy. Preserves CRITICAL and HIGH severity events. Restricted to administrators.

Submit multiple document generation requests in a single call. Requests are validated, tracked in database with QUEUED status, and published to JMS queue. Maximum 10,000 requests per batch. Returns tracking IDs for all successfully queued requests.

200.description: Bulk submission processed (check response for individual failures)

post.description: Checks if template file has been modified or tampered with by comparing current HMAC digest with stored digest. Returns 409 Conflict if integrity check fails. (Admin role required)

200.description: Integrity verified successfully - file is unchanged

422.description: Integrity violation - file may have been tampered with

500.description: Failed to verify integrity - IO error

post.summary: Regenerate integrity digest for a template
post.description: Recalculates and updates the HMAC-SHA256 digest for template verification. Use this after legitimate template updates or when a digest file is corrupted. (Admin role required)

500.description: Failed to regenerate digest - IO error

post.summary: Regenerate integrity digests for all templates
post.description: Recalculates and updates HMAC-SHA256 digests for all templates in the system. Use this operation after changing the file.integrity.secret-key configuration or when migrating templates. Returns a map with template IDs as keys and status ('SUCCESS' or error message) as values. Returns 200 for all success, 500 for all failures, or 207 Multi-Status for partial success. (Admin role required)

207.description: Multi-Status - some digests regenerated successfully, some failed

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of document templates with optional search
Retrieve metadata for a specific document template

delete.description: Remove a document template from the system (Manager role required)

get.description: Retrieve required parameters for generating the document template
Retrieve stored field definitions for a specific document template
Download a document template by its UUID. Returns a ZIP file containing the template. Accessible by all authenticated users.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the template to download

get.description: Retrieve list of available ICC color profiles for PDF export. These profiles can be used with the pdfExportOptions parameter when generating PDF documents.

Retrieve list of available font families for document generation. These fonts can be used in JRXML templates with fontName attribute. Includes information about available font faces (normal, bold, italic, boldItalic) and PDF embedding status.
Retrieve all system configuration settings. Returns comprehensive configuration data including JasperReports settings, system parameters, and feature flags.

Get current authentication configuration status including all enabled authentication methods. Returns both legacy flags (oauth2Enabled, jwtEnabled, adfsEnabled) and current configuration flags (internalEnabled, oauth2ClientEnabled, oauth2WebEnabled) for backward compatibility.
Handle successful OAuth2 authentication and provide token information

401.description: OAuth2 authentication failed or session expired

get.description: Handle failed OAuth2 authentication attempts

get.summary: Get audit logs for specific user
get.description: Retrieve paginated audit logs for a specific user by their UUID. Returns all audit events associated with the user within the specified time period. Admin role required.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: UUID of the user to retrieve audit logs for

get.description: Retrieve detailed audit statistics including event counts, user activity (top 20), client activity (top 20 OAuth2 clients), daily trends, IP address analysis (top 10), unique metrics, and performance data for a specified time period. Admin role required.
Retrieve the list of all available audit log severity levels (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, CRITICAL). Use these values when filtering audit logs by severity.
Retrieve high-priority security-related audit logs (Admin role required)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time for filtering security events

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time for filtering security events

get.description: Retrieve paginated audit logs with optional filtering (Admin role required)
Retrieve details of a specific audit log entry by ID (Admin role required)
Checks if the audit system is operational and responding. Available to all authenticated users.
Retrieves paginated list of audit logs for failed operations within specified time range. Restricted to administrators.
Returns a list of all available audit event types that can be used for filtering audit logs. Restricted to administrators.

Analyze user behavior patterns including user creations, role assignments, login activities, and access patterns. Includes comprehensive statistics for identifying unusual user behavior and access trends. Default period is last 7 days. Admin role required.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time for user pattern analysis (default: 7 days ago)

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time for user pattern analysis (default: now)

get.description: Retrieve system health metrics from audit logs including application errors, database errors, external service errors, authentication issues, and validation failures. Analyzes last 24 hours of system activity for health monitoring and troubleshooting. Admin role required.
Retrieve security threat summary for the last 24 hours (Admin role required)
Retrieve real-time audit dashboard overview with statistics and recent events (Admin role required)

Retrieve compliance-related audit data including critical operations such as user deletions, role changes, access grants/revocations, configuration changes, and authentication bypass attempts. Provides comprehensive compliance tracking for regulatory requirements. Admin role required.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time for compliance analysis period

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time for compliance analysis period

get.description: Returns JMS listener container status and list of currently processing requests
Returns paginated list of async requests with optional filtering by status, userId, templateId, and time

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filter by created after this timestamp (ISO format)

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific async request including metrics and error information
Returns queue depth, performance metrics, throughput, and error rates for async document generation
Returns Actuator-style health check for async components (ActiveMQ, queue depth, workers)
Returns paginated list of failed or timed-out async requests for troubleshooting

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Show errors since this timestamp (ISO format, default: last 24 hours)
List of parameter values for document generation

filename.description: Optional client-specified filename for the generated document. Automatically sanitized and extension added based on format

additionalProperties.description: Optional JSON data source for complex reports. Can contain arrays, objects, or any valid JSON structure

data.description: Optional JSON data source for complex reports. Can contain arrays, objects, or any valid JSON structure

documentLocale.description: Optional locale for internationalization and formatting (e.g., 'pl_PL', 'en_US'). Affects number, date, and currency formatting

ignorePagination.description: Optional pagination control. When true, ignores pagination and renders as continuous content

GenerateRequestDto.description: Document generation request with parameters and optional data

embedFonts.description: Whether to embed fonts in the HTML output. Set to false for email usage to reduce file size. When disabled, HTML will rely on system/web fonts.

embedImages.description: Whether to embed images directly in the HTML. When true, images are stored as separate files in the assets directory. When false, images may be base64-encoded inline (if supported).

useWebSafeFonts.description: Whether to use web-safe font fallbacks (Arial, Times New Roman, etc.) instead of custom fonts. Recommended for email usage.

removeEmptySpace.description: Whether to remove empty space between rows in tables to create more compact output.

wrapBreakWord.description: Whether to wrap text at word boundaries to prevent horizontal scrolling.

ignorePageMargins.description: Whether to ignore page margins from the report design. Useful for responsive HTML output.

HtmlExportOptionsDto.description: HTML-specific export options for controlling output characteristics

ParameterValueDto.description: List of parameter values for document generation

pdfaConformance.description: PDF/A conformance level for long-term archival and accessibility. Note: PDF/A and encryption are mutually exclusive.

iccProfile.description: ICC color profile name for CMYK color management in professional printing. Profile files must be available in classpath:icc/

userPassword.description: Password required to open and view the PDF document. Leave empty to allow opening without password.

ownerPassword.description: Password required to change security settings or permissions. Recommended to be different from userPassword.

canPrint.description: Allow or deny printing of the document. Default is true (printing allowed).

canPrintHighQuality.description: Allow high-quality printing. If false, only low-resolution printing is allowed. Default is true.

canModify.description: Allow or deny modification of document content. Default is false (modification not allowed).

canCopy.description: Allow or deny copying of text and graphics. Default is true (copying allowed).

canFillForms.description: Allow or deny filling in form fields. Default is true (form filling allowed).

canAnnotate.description: Allow or deny adding annotations and comments. Default is true (annotations allowed).

canAssemble.description: Allow or deny document assembly (inserting, deleting, rotating pages). Default is false.

encryptionKeyLength.description: Encryption key length in bits. 128 for AES-128 (compatible), 256 for AES-256 (more secure). Default is 128.

PdfExportOptionsDto.description: PDF-specific export configuration for professional printing, archival, and security purposes

metadata.example: Financial report template with quarterly data

batchCorrelationId.description: Optional correlation ID for the entire batch

BulkAsyncRequestDto.description: Bulk request with array of document generation requests

requestId.description: Optional client-provided request ID (UUID generated if omitted)

correlationId.description: Optional correlation ID for client-side tracking

format.description: Output format: PDF, XLSX, DOCX, RTF, HTML

parameters.description: Parameters as list of {name, value} objects

additionalProperties.description: Parameters as list of {name, value} objects

items.description: Parameters as list of {name, value} objects

data.description: Optional JSON data source for the report

replyQueue.description: JMS reply queue for response delivery

BulkRequestItem.description: Single document generation request within bulk submission

batchCorrelationId.description: Correlation ID for the entire batch

estimatedTotalProcessingMs.description: Estimated total processing time in milliseconds

BulkAsyncResponseDto.description: Response for bulk async submission with tracking information

index.description: Index in the original request array (0-based)
Index in the original request array (0-based)

name.description: Font family name as used in JRXML templates

faces.description: Available font faces (normal, bold, italic, boldItalic)

items.description: Available font faces (normal, bold, italic, boldItalic)

pdfEmbedded.description: Whether the font is embedded in PDF output

FontFamilyDto.description: Information about an available font family for document generation

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
